name: sum function
description: Write a function which will be return sum of two integers passing as an arguments. For example, sum(2, 2) should return 4. Argument will be passing in main(String[] args) as args variable
subject: programming essentials

name: square function
description: Write a function which will be return square of integer passing as an arguments. For example, square(2) should return 4. Argument will be passing in main(String[] args) as args variable
subject: programming essentials
